45814432.author: jayVink
45814432.title: Stargirl
45814432.summary: Hermione Jean Granger remembers, her dying, in the middle of the war. She hoped and wished that Harry and the others had won.Now, she meets Lady magic in the afterlife, giving her a second chance in life. But in repayment, Lady magic will erase her memories of her past life, all of it.Now, Reborn as Hermione Lyra Lestrange, sister of Rodolphus and Rabastan Lestrange. Daughter of Reinhard Lestrange and Aquila Sewlyn.

While wandering the haunting hall of his childhood home, he comes across an ancient Black artifact that could give him a chance to do it all over again, a final shot at redemption.

45814132.author: Xotton22
45814132.title: saint bernard sits at the top of the driveway (you always said how you loved dogs)
45814132.summary: Harry Potter hated dogs with a passion.They were loud and viscous, not dissimilar to sharks. They smelt fear and got into your face, and Harry loathed them.Or: Harry’s complicated relationship towards emotions and family, and how dogs represent it all.
freeform: As in the title is lyrics from the song Saint Bernard

45813922.author: SiriuslySapphic
45813922.title: META: Trans!Narcissa Malfoy
45813922.summary: This is a 7000 words meta post on my headcanon for trans!Narcissa. It's divided over 8 bullet points, including a brief overview of what I imagine queerness in pureblood society to be treated as, the Black family dynamics in general and the importance of first sons and Heirs, and Narcissa's general position within the family and later within the Malfoy family and in raising Draco.

45813607.author: Eclipzwe
45813607.title: For A Rainy Day | Draco Malfoy
45813607.summary: ❝ Just promise me you're on my side. ❞ He begged.❝ I promise. ❞ She lied. Madeline Buckley loves Draco Malfoy.As sixth year begins and Draco's marks begin to slip, Madeline finds herself falling headfirst into whatever sick task Draco has been given, determined to uncover his secrets and free him from the barbaric chains rendering him powerless--all the while trying to keep her feelings at bay because when lives are at stake, it really shouldn't matter how good a boy looks in a black suit jacket.
warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
freeform: Book 6: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

45813142.author: tonistaaark
45813142.title: 𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐛𝐢𝐝𝐝𝐞𝐧 𝐟𝐫𝐮𝐢𝐭
45813142.summary: Being reborn as the female counterpart of Harry Potter was dangerous and anxious enough, she had not expected to learn that a second world was waiting for its hero. Even though she had been aware that her father was indeed, Poseidon, God of the Sea, she had hoped it was just a fluke or a dimension travel issue.Beware of a God's love: possessive, dark and dangerous - and Poseidon is famous for his destructive temper. Especially when he cannot even fathom losing her. Percy is about to learn that an attached deity is a dangerous and unpredictable one."𝑻𝒉𝒆 𝒔𝒆𝒂 𝒅𝒐𝒆𝒔 𝒏𝒐𝒕 𝒍𝒊𝒌𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒃𝒆 𝒓𝒆𝒔𝒕𝒓𝒂𝒊𝒏𝒆𝒅" - a true battle of will.How will the Gods cope with a sassy and powerful Percy Jackson? Especially when she does not limit herself to only one of her father's domain and dazzles them with her fiery personality.
fandom: Percy Jackson and the Olympians - Rick Riordan
Percy Jackson and the Olympians & Related Fandoms - All Media Types
freeform: Harry Potter is Lord of Multiple Noble Houses

45812110.author: starchisa
45812110.title: legatum siderum
45812110.summary:
“If I did run away, hypothetically, what would you think of me then?”
“I would resent you.”
“Even though you were the one who suggested it?”
“Yes.” Regulus replies, with an honesty that he doesn’t really expect. “But I would understand why you would do it. So don’t let my resentment be the reason you decide to stay.”
sirius and regulus discuss what it means to have a legacy, as well as the consequences that come from running away from it.
freeform: The Noble and Most Ancient House of Black
this fic takes place just before sirius runs away
so sirius is 16 and regulus is 15

45812014.author: sunstarunicorn
45812014.title: Calling on Dragons
45812014.summary: As the first Old Dragon born in over a thousand years, Spyro is a breed apart, even from his own kind.  Then a wandering Welsh Green decides the young dragon is her hatchling and, worse, Spike is an egg thief.  To save his friend’s life, Spyro must mix fire, magic, and a few aerial aerobatics as only an Old Dragon can.  In the meantime, Spyro’s real mother arrives on the scene – and she’s not happy with her Dragonlord’s choice of guardian.
fandom: Chronicles of Narnia - C. S. Lewis

45811930.author: panhardEBR
45811930.title: For trying to love
45811930.summary: Поки Гаррі, хлопець доволі популярний, став жертвою фанфікшину, Фред заплутався у власних почуттях, а на фронті з'являється Драко, що намагається принизити Поттера. Як близнюки Візлі використають ці події та що з того вийде.
